default-modal-subtitle: Using Coachseek is easy. Let's create your first coaching session!

popover.drag-service: Now just drag "__serviceName__" onto the calendar.
popover.drag-service-hint: Hint: Dont worry about dropping it in the wrong place, you can change it anytime, just drag it around!
popover.session-modal: You can customize the session ‘til your heart’s content.
popover.session-modal-hint: Hint: If you make a session ‘available to book online’, then you can start receiving customers right away.

review.first-message: 1) Settings - create the rest of your coaching biz
review.second-message: 2) Booking - you already have your very own Online Booking site
review.third-message: 3) Spreadsheets? Seriously, you won't need them…
review.hint: Hint: Click the big question mark in the top right to get to our Help Desk or to ask any questions!

exit.gone-forever: You won't see our sweet little tour ever again.

coachFirstName-invalid: Oops! Try fixing the coaches first name.
coachLastName-invalid: Oops! Try fixing the coaches last name.
serviceName-invalid: Oops! Try fixing the service name.
locationName-invalid: Oops! Try fixing the location name.

mobileOnboardingSignUp.slide-description-1: Your clients can book online 24/7 for group or one-to-one lessons.
mobileOnboardingSignUp.slide-description-2: Our calendar keeps you and your team at the top of your game, no mater where you are.
mobileOnboardingSignUp.slide-description-3: With online payment you'll never be chasing, and no more checks left in the bottom of your coaching bag.
mobileOnboardingSignUp.slide-description-4: Checking in your students from your iPhone or iPad makes paper registers a thing of the past.

mobileOnboardingSkipModal.title: Continue on with these tips?
mobileOnboardingSkipModal.no: No, I don’t want to see these hints

mobileOnboardingDefault.welcome-description: We want to show you how easy Coachseek is, let's set up your first online bookable lesson!
mobileOnboardingDefault.business-description: What is the name and email of your business?
mobileOnboardingDefault.security-description: Password to keep your info secured
mobileOnboardingDefault.calendar-description-3: on the calendar to select a time you want to teach this lesson!
mobileOnboardingDefault.wrap-up-3: We've sent you an email to help you along this journey. Check your inbox for the link to share this lesson with your students.
